resources.string: tATA is my hobby project, I made it for my personal use. I wanted to be able to locate my car at anytime (even via SMS), and most importantly I wanted to have a more sophisticated alarm mechanism than the built-in ones. tATA calls you instead of annoying the people around the car.
Keep in mind that tATA is not a professional car alarm solution, use at your own risk.
Icons made by Freepik, Zurb, Icons8 from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC BY 3.0\n Icons made by Jim Ceasar, Designerz Base, WPZOOM car, eye, shield\n AndroidAssetStudio was used to generate icons
